title: mc_observers::EncoderObserver
description: The Encoder Observer updates the state of a robot kinematic properties (body positions and velocities) using joint sensor values. It can use various sources as sensor input: encoder position, encoder velocity, values from another robot, and can also estimate joint velocities from encoder position by finite differences.

robot.description: Name of the robot to observe

updateRobot.description: Name of the robot to update

position.description: Sensor/method used to observe joint position

velocity.description: Sensor/method used to observe joint velocity

computeFK.description: When true, the update computes forward kinematics

computeFV.description: When true, the update computes forward velocity

position.description: When true, logs the estimated position of all actuated joints

velocity.description: When true, logs the estimated velocity of all actuated joints
